sections.heading: attorney; city attorney; criminal charge, juvenile court petition, pretrial diversion, restorative justice, or transfer of case; determination; considerations; referral to community-based resources

sections.heading: degree murder and use of a deadly weapon charges filed against a 15-year-old were retained in the district court; the trial court's denial of a motion to transfer to the juvenile court is reviewed for an abuse of discretion
sections.text: State v. Leroux, 26 Neb. App. 76, 916 N.W.2d 903 (2018).
